IntVectorProperty.name: ResolveCoincidentTopology
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the mode to use to overcome the OpenGL rendering issue when faces coincide with lines and points.

Entry.text: Offset faces relative to lines and points
Offset lines and points relative to faces
Shift z-buffer when rendering lines and points

DoubleVectorProperty.name: PolygonOffsetParameters
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the polygon offset parameters to control how polygon depths are shifted in the depth buffer. Change these parameters to change how coincident lines, points, and polygons are resolved when rendering. The first parameter controls how much the angle of the polygon relative to the camera view plane contributes to the depth offset of pixels in the rendered polygon. The second parameter is a constant offset to add to the depth buffer. Refer to the OpenGL manual on glPolygonOffset for further details on these parameters.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: LineOffsetParameters
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Parameters used the same way as the parameters in **Polygon Offset Parameters**, but applied when lines are rendered.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: PointOffsetParameter
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Specifies a constant depth offset to apply when points are rendered.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: ZShift
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the fraction by which to shift the z-buffer range when rendering lines and points.

IntVectorProperty.name: DepthPeeling
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable depth-peeling to correctly render translucent polygons. May slow down rendering performance.

IntVectorProperty.name: DepthPeelingForVolumes
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Include volumes in the depth-peeling pass to correctly render intermixed volumes with translucent polygons. May slow down rendering performance.

IntVectorProperty.name: MaximumNumberOfPeels
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the maximum number of peels to use when depth peeling is employed.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseFXAA
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable FXAA antialiasing on 3D geometry.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: FXAARelativeContrastThreshold
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Relative Contrast Threshold
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Contrast threshold for applying FXAA to a pixel, relative to max luminance. Lower values will affect more edges. Default is 0.125.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: FXAAHardContrastThreshold
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Hard Contrast Threshold
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Hard contrast threshold for applying FXAA to a pixel. Lower values will affect more edges. Default is 0.045.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: FXAASubpixelBlendLimit
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Subpixel Blend Limit
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Maximum amount of lowpass filtering to apply to the final pixel color to correct subpixel aliasing. Default value is 0.75.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: FXAASubpixelContrastThreshold
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Subpixel Contrast Threshold
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Contrast threshold for subpixel aliasing detection. Higher values decrease sensitivity to subpixel aliasing. Default value is 0.25.

IntVectorProperty.name: FXAAUseHighQualityEndpoints
IntVectorProperty.label: Improve Single Pixel Lines
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When enabled, a more sensitive endpoint detection method is used. Disabling this will improve performance, but single-pixel lines will have noticeable artifacts. Default is On.

IntVectorProperty.name: FXAAEndpointSearchIterations
IntVectorProperty.label: Endpoint Search Iterations
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Endpoint detection radius. Higher values will provide higher quality aliasing for long edges, but performance will suffer. Default is 12.

IntVectorProperty.name: ToneMappingType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify tone mapping type. Clamp, Reinhard and Exponential are simpler than the GenericFilmic operator which can be fully parameterized to configure the shadows as well as the highlights.

IntVectorProperty.name: GenericFilmicPresets
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Use predefined presets for Generic Filmic. Using the default parameters it approximates the Academy Color Encoding System (ACES). To use the popular "Uncharted 2" filmic tone mapping curve instead, set the property to Uncharted2. Set this property to Custom to set custom parameters.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Contrast
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Contrast
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Adjust the toe of the curve. Typically in [1-2].

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Shoulder
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Shoulder
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Limit the output in the shoulder region of the curve. Typically in [0.9-1].

DoubleVectorProperty.name: MidIn
DoubleVectorProperty.label: MidIn
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Mid level anchor input in percent gray.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: MidOut
DoubleVectorProperty.label: MidOut
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Mid level anchor output in percent gray.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: HdrMax
DoubleVectorProperty.label: HdrMax
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Maximum HDR input that is not clipped.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseACES
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable the Academy Color Encoding System (ACES).

IntVectorProperty.name: UseSSAODefaultPresets
IntVectorProperty.label: Use Default Presets
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If enabled, the SSAO radius and bias will be calculated depending on the size of the bounding box of the geometry. Disable to manually specify the radius and bias.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Radius
DoubleVectorProperty.label: SSAO hemisphere radius
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the SSAO hemisphere radius.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Bias
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the SSAO bias when comparing samples.

IntVectorProperty.name: KernelSize
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the SSAO number of samples.

IntVectorProperty.name: Blur
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable or disable the blurring of the ambient occlusion. Blurring can help to improve the result if samples number is low.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: LODThreshold
DoubleVectorProperty.label: LOD Threshold
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the data size (in megabytes) beyond which to employ decimation, if possible, to speed renders when interacting. 0 implies the use of decimation for all interactive renders.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: LODResolution
DoubleVectorProperty.label: LOD Resolution
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the factor used to compute the decimated geometry when employed. This affects the size of the grid used for quadric clustering. For example, 1.0 implies maximum resolution while 0 implies minimum resolution.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: NonInteractiveRenderDelay
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: If decimated geometry was used for rendering during interaction, set the delay (in seconds) before doing a full resolution render when the interaction is finished.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: WindowResizeNonInteractiveRenderDelay
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the delay (in seconds) before doing a full resolution render after the last resize of the window.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseOutlineForLODRendering
IntVectorProperty.label: Use Outline For LOD Rendering
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Use outline, instead of decimated geometry when interacting, if applicable.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: RemoteRenderThreshold
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the data size (in megabytes) beyond which to render data remotely (or in parallel) when connected to parallel rendering capable server. In that case the rendered images are delivered to the client. Otherwise, the geometry is delivered to the client and rendering happens locally.

IntVectorProperty.name: StillRenderImageReductionFactor
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the sub-sampling factor to use for non-interactive rendering. When rendering on large tiles (or multiple tiles), sub-sampling will help improve image compositing performance. This has no effect if remote/parallel rendering is not being used.

IntVectorProperty.name: ImageReductionFactor
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: To reduce image compositing costs during interactions, set the image sub-sampling factor. Set to 1 to not use any subsampling.

StringVectorProperty.name: CompressorConfig
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the compression method used when transferring rendered images from the server to the client.

IntVectorProperty.name: OutlineThreshold
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When opening a dataset or creating a new filter that has a number of cells greater than this threshold (in millions), use the Outline representation by default.

IntVectorProperty.name: DefaultInteractionMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When opening a dataset, set the initial interaction mode.

Entry.text: Automatic, based on the first time step

IntVectorProperty.name: ShowAnnotation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set whether to see annotation providing advanced debugging and performance information about each render.

IntVectorProperty.name: PointPickingRadius
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the radius (in pixels) to include when using *Select Points On* to click-and-select a single point on the **Render View**.

IntVectorProperty.name: DisableIceT
IntVectorProperty.label: Disable IceT
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set to disable IceT (default is unchecked). This is not common and only provided for special rendering modes/mappers.

IntVectorProperty.name: EnableFastPreselection
IntVectorProperty.label: Enable fast preselection
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable fast preselection. When enabled, the preselection is computed using the visible geometry. This dramatically improves performance of preselection highlighting, especially for big datasets.

IntVectorProperty.name: Camera3DManipulators
IntVectorProperty.label: Camera 3D Manipulators
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Select how interactions are mapped to camera movements when in 3D interaction mode.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Camera3DMouseWheelMotionFactor
DoubleVectorProperty.label: 3D Mouse Wheel Factor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the wheel motion factor for 3D interaction.

IntVectorProperty.name: Camera2DManipulators
IntVectorProperty.label: Camera 2D Manipulators
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Select how interactions are mapped to camera movements when in 2D interaction mode.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Camera2DMouseWheelMotionFactor
DoubleVectorProperty.label: 2D Mouse Wheel Factor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the wheel motion factor for 2D interaction.

StringVectorProperty.name: FilterExpressions
StringVectorProperty.label: Filter Expressions
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: List of expressions used to filter out arrays you do not want to display in the color array list.

DoubleVectorProperty.label: Border
DoubleVectorProperty.name: BorderColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Color used for border surrounding the text.

DoubleVectorProperty.label: Surface
DoubleVectorProperty.name: SurfaceColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Color used when solid coloring surfaces and faces.

DoubleVectorProperty.label: Foreground
DoubleVectorProperty.name: ForegroundColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Color used for rendering elements like wireframes, points.

DoubleVectorProperty.label: Edges
DoubleVectorProperty.name: EdgeColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Color used for the edges when using 'Surface With Edges' representation.

DoubleVectorProperty.label: Text
DoubleVectorProperty.name: TextAnnotationColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Color used for text and other annotations.

DoubleVectorProperty.label: Selection
DoubleVectorProperty.name: SelectionColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Color used for showing selected cells/points.

DoubleVectorProperty.label: Interactive Selection
DoubleVectorProperty.name: InteractiveSelectionColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Color used for showing interactive selection.

DoubleVectorProperty.label: Interactive Widget
DoubleVectorProperty.name: InteractiveWidgetColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Color used for showing interactive widget.

IntVectorProperty.name: BackgroundColorMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Select the background color mode.

DoubleVectorProperty.label: Background 2
DoubleVectorProperty.name: BackgroundColor2
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Color used for the top section for gradient backgrounds.

DoubleVectorProperty.label: Background
DoubleVectorProperty.name: BackgroundColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Color used as background for the view. When using gradient backgrounds, this is the color used for the lower section of the viewport.

Property.name: LoadPalette
Property.Documentation: You can explicitly set the colors in the application's color palette above or you can load one of the predefined color palettes to initialize the active palette.

IntVectorProperty.name: AutomaticRescaleRangeMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Choose whether and how to automatically rescale the color map range. "Never" means the color map range will never be changed. "Grow and update on 'Apply'" will expand the range to contain the union of the current range and the range of the current data source. "Grow and update every timestep" will expand the range to contain the union of the current range and the range of the current data source when the timestep is changed. "Clamp and update every timestep" will update the color map range to the current source data range.

IntVectorProperty.name: IndexedLookup
IntVectorProperty.label: Interpret Values As Categories
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When enabled, the color transfer function switches to indexed-lookup (categorical colors) mode.

IntVectorProperty.name: AnnotationsInitialized
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set to 1 to indicate that the annotations have been initialized.

IntVectorProperty.name: ShowIndexedColorActiveValues
IntVectorProperty.label: Show Categorical Colors in Data Range Only
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When interpreting values as categories, enabling this option results in the display of only the 'active' categorical colors for values in the data range, i.e., values that exist in the source. You may need to click the 'Rescale to Data Range' button to update the active values that are displayed.

IntVectorProperty.name: RescaleOnVisibilityChange
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Flag indicating whether the color map data range should be updated when a representation's visibility changes.

IntVectorProperty.name: EnableOpacityMapping
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When enabled, the opacity transfer function is used for rendering, if applicable.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: RGBPoints
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the control points that form the color-transfer-function. These are a list of 4-tuples of the form (x, r, g, b) where x is the data value, and r,g,b are three color components in the range [0,1].

IntVectorProperty.name: UseOpacityControlPointsFreehandDrawing
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Proxy only property used by the ColorOpacityWidget to know if freehand drawing should be used

IntVectorProperty.name: ShowDataHistogram
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Proxy only property used by the ColorOpacityWidget to know if the data histogram should be shown

IntVectorProperty.name: AutomaticDataHistogramComputation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Proxy only property used by the ColorOpacityWidget to know if the data histogram should be automatically computed

IntVectorProperty.name: DataHistogramNumberOfBins
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Proxy only property used by the ColorOpacityWidget to know the number of bin to use to compute the data histogram

IntVectorProperty.name: ColorSpace
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The color space used for interpolation: RGB, HSV, Lab (CIELAB), or Diverging. In HSV mode, if HSVWrap is on, it will take the shortest path in Hue (going back through 0 if that is the shortest way around the hue circle) whereas if HSVWrap is off it will not go through 0 (in order the match the current functionality of vtkLookupTable). Diverging is a special mode where colors will pass through white when interpolating between two saturated colors. In Lab/CIEDE2000 mode, it will take the shortest path in the Lab color space with respect to the CIE Delta E 2000 color distance measure. In Step mode, the color of an interval is the color of the second point of the interval.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseBelowRangeColor
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Use special color to use when a data value is below the range of the color map.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: BelowRangeColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the color to use when a data value is below the range of the color map.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseAboveRangeColor
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Use special color to use when a data value is above the range of the color map.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: AboveRangeColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the color to use when a data value is above the range of the color map.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: NanColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the color to use when NaN (not-a-number) is encountered.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: NanOpacity
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the opacity to use when NaN (not-a-number) is encountered.

IntVectorProperty.name: Discretize
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set, the color transfer function will comprise of discrete colors with number of discrete colors specified using NumberOfTableValues.

IntVectorProperty.name: NumberOfTableValues
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When Discretize is set, this specifies the number of discrete colors that must be present in the transfer function.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: ScalarRangeInitialized
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set to 1 to indicate that the scalar range has been initialized.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: IndexedColors
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Colors used when using IndexedLookup is true.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: IndexedOpacities
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Opacities used when using IndexedLookup is true.

IntVectorProperty.name: ScalarRangeInitialized
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set to 1 to indicate that the scalar range has been initialized.

StringVectorProperty.name: Title
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the title text with respect to the color legend.

StringVectorProperty.name: ComponentTitle
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the component title text with respect to the color legend.

IntVectorProperty.name: TitleJustification
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the justification of the title text with respect to the color legend.

IntVectorProperty.name: HorizontalTitle
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When on, orients the title horizontally. When off (default), the title will be rotated counter-clockwise 90 degrees and lie parallel to the color bar.

IntVectorProperty.name: HorizontalTitle2
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When on, orients the title horizontally. When off (default), the title will be rotated counter-clockwise 90 degrees and lie parallel to the color bar.

IntVectorProperty.name: ScalarBarThickness
IntVectorProperty.label: Color Bar Thickness
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Sets the width of the scalar bar when vertically oriented and the height when horizontally oriented.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: ScalarBarLength
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Color Bar Length
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Sets the length of the scalar bar. The length is defined as a fraction of window width or height when the color legend is horizontal or vertical, respectively.

IntVectorProperty.name: ReverseLegend
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When on, the color bar and all associated ticks and notations will be reversed, from high to low instead of low to high.

IntVectorProperty.name: AutomaticLabelFormat
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set if the number format used for the labels (specified as a C-style printf format string) will be automatically generated to make the numbers best fit within the widget. When off, the Label Format property will be used.

StringVectorProperty.name: LabelFormat
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the number format (specified as a C-style printf format string) with which to print the labels on the color legend. Can be used only if Automatic Label Format is off.

IntVectorProperty.name: DrawNanAnnotation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set whether the NaN annotation should be rendered or not.

IntVectorProperty.name: DrawAnnotations
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set whether text annotations should be rendered or not.

IntVectorProperty.name: AddRangeAnnotations
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set whether the data range endpoints (minimum and maximum) are added as annotations.

IntVectorProperty.name: AutomaticAnnotations
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set, annotations are automatically created according the number of colors shown on the scalar bar.

IntVectorProperty.name: AddRangeLabels
IntVectorProperty.label: Add Range Labels
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set whether to add range labels or not. These are labels that have the minimum/maximum values of the color legend range.

StringVectorProperty.name: RangeLabelFormat
StringVectorProperty.label: Range Label Format
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set number format for range labels (specified as a C-style printf format string). Can be used only if Add Range Labels is enabled.

StringVectorProperty.name: NanAnnotation
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the annotation text for "NaN" values. Can be used only if Draw Nan Annotation is enabled.

IntVectorProperty.name: DrawTickMarks
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/disable drawing the color legend tick marks.

IntVectorProperty.name: DrawTickLabels
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/disable drawing the color legend labels for tick marks.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseCustomLabels
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable the use of custom label values.

IntVectorProperty.name: TextPosition
IntVectorProperty.label: Tick and Annotation Positions
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Determines where the tick labels are drawn.

Proxy.name: FlagpoleLabel
Proxy.Documentation: FlagpoleLabel is a 3D representation for a text source.

IntVectorProperty.name: Visibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Show/hide the flagpole lable.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: BasePosition
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The world coordinate position of the base of the flagpole.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: TopPosition
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The world coordinate position of the top of the flagpole.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: FlagSize
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The size of the flag. 1.0 is the default size which corresponds to a preset texels/window value. Adjust this to increase or decrease the default size.The world coordinate position of the top of the flagpole.

Proxy.name: BillboardTextActor3D
Proxy.Documentation: BillboardTextActor3D is a 3D representation for a text source.

IntVectorProperty.name: Visibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Show/hide the billboard text actor.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: BillboardPosition
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The world coordinate position of the anchor point of the text billboard.

IntVectorProperty.name: DisplayOffset
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Fixed offset from the anchor point in display coordinated to be used.

Proxy.name: GridAxes3DActor
Proxy.Documentation: GridAxes3DActor can be used to render a grid in a render view.

IntVectorProperty.name: Visibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Show/hide the axes grid.

StringVectorProperty.name: XTitle
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the title string for X axis.

StringVectorProperty.name: YTitle
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the title string for Y axis.

StringVectorProperty.name: ZTitle
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the title string for Z axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: FacesToRender
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the mask to select faces. The faces rendered will be a subset of the faces selected depending on the status of **CullBackface** and **CullFrontface** properties.

IntVectorProperty.name: CullBackface
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set to true to hide faces of the grid facing away from the camera i.e. hide all back faces.

IntVectorProperty.name: CullFrontface
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set to true to hide faces of the grid facing towards from the camera i.e. hide all front faces.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: GridColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Color used when coloring the grid wireframe

IntVectorProperty.name: ShowGrid
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Turn off to not render the plane grids.

IntVectorProperty.name: ShowEdges
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Turn off to not render the plane edges.

IntVectorProperty.name: ShowTicks
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Turn off to not render the tick marks.

IntVectorProperty.name: AxesToLabel
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the mask to select the axes to label. The axes labelled will be a subset of the axes selected depending on which faces are also being rendered.

IntVectorProperty.name: LabelUniqueEdgesOnly
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set to true to only label edges shared with 1 face. Note that if all faces are being rendered, this will generate no labels.

IntVectorProperty.name: XAxisNotation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Get/set the numerical notation, standard, scientific or mixed (0, 1, 2) for X Axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: XAxisPrecision
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Get/set the numerical precision to use for the X Axis, default is 2.

IntVectorProperty.name: XAxisUseCustomLabels
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify whether to use custom labels for the X axis. Labels specified by **XAxisLabels** are used only when this flag is set to 1.

IntVectorProperty.name: YAxisNotation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Get/set the numerical notation, standard, scientific or mixed (0, 1, 2) for Y Axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: YAxisPrecision
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Get/set the numerical precision to use for the Y Axis, default is 2.

IntVectorProperty.name: YAxisUseCustomLabels
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify whether to use custom labels for the Y axis. Labels specified by **YAxisLabels** are used only when this flag is set to 1.

IntVectorProperty.name: ZAxisNotation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Get/set the numerical notation, standard, scientific or mixed (0, 1, 2) for Z Axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: ZAxisPrecision
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Get/set the numerical precision to use for the Z Axis, default is 2.

IntVectorProperty.name: ZAxisUseCustomLabels
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify whether to use custom labels for the Z axis. Labels specified by **ZAxisLabels** are used only when this flag is set to 1.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseCustomBounds
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If set, the axes will use explicitly specified bounds rather than using the bounds computed from datasets currently visible in the view.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: CustomBounds
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the explicit bounds to use when **UseCustomBounds** is checked.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: DataScale
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: If data is being scaled, you can show the original data bounds for the axes instead of the scaled bounds by setting the DataScale to match the scaling applied to the dataset.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: DataPosition
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: If data is being translated, you can show the original data bounds for the axes instead of the translated bounds by setting the DataPosition to match the translation applied to the dataset.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: DataBoundsScaleFactor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: After the data bounds have been computed, this property enables to scale the bounds used to generate the axes grid, so it will be slightly larger than the data bounds. Data bounds are not modified, only the aspect of the AxesGrid is modified. The default value (1.0008) ensures that there is no concident lines drawn when zooming close enough to the model.

ViewLayoutProxy.name: ViewLayout
ViewLayoutProxy.Documentation: Proxy used to manage layout for multiple views.

IntVectorProperty.name: PreviewMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the target resolution for the preview mode to display, [0, 0] is interpreted as exiting preview.

IntVectorProperty.name: SeparatorWidth
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The width of the separator (in pixels) to be displayed in preview mode.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: SeparatorColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The color of the separator to be displayed in preview mode.

IntVectorProperty.name: SaveAllViews
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When checked, all views in the active layout will be saved in the image. Otherwise only the active view will be saved.

IntVectorProperty.name: ImageResolution
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Choose the image resolution in pixels.

IntVectorProperty.name: FontScaling
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Select how fonts are to be scaled when saving images at different resolution than the current size.

IntVectorProperty.name: SeparatorWidth
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the width of border (in pixels) to use around views when **Save All Views** is checked.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: SeparatorColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Select the separator color.

StringVectorProperty.name: OverrideColorPalette
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Choose the color palette to load before saving the image.

IntVectorProperty.name: StereoMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Select a stereo mode, as needed.

IntVectorProperty.name: TransparentBackground
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set whether to use a transparent background.

SaveScreenshotProxy.name: SaveScreenshot
SaveScreenshotProxy.label: Save Screenshot
SaveScreenshotProxy.Documentation: Proxy used to save screenshots from view(s) or layouts.

ProxyGroup.name: screenshot_writers
ProxyGroup.Documentation: This group includes all writers which can be used to write screenshots in ParaView.

Proxy.name: PNG
Proxy.Documentation: Writer for saving screenshots as PNG files.

IntVectorProperty.name: CompressionLevel
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the *zlib* compression level. **0** is no compression, while **9** is maximum compression.

StringVectorProperty.name: MetaData
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property enables adding meta data as text chunks to the output PNG file in the form of text key/value pairs.

Proxy.name: JPEG
Proxy.Documentation: Writer for saving screenshots as JPEG files.

IntVectorProperty.name: Quality
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the JPEG compression quality. **O** is low quality (maximum compression) and **100** is high quality (least compression).

IntVectorProperty.name: Progressive
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Save progressive JPEG.

Proxy.name: TIFF
Proxy.Documentation: Writer for saving screenshots as TIFF files.

IntVectorProperty.name: Compression
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify compression type.

Proxy.name: BMP
Proxy.Documentation: Writer for saving screenshots as BMP files.

Proxy.name: VTK
Proxy.Documentation: Writer for saving screenshots as VTK files.

IntVectorProperty.name: FileType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the file type (ASCII or Binary).
